comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Francis Bowes Sayre married Jessie Woodrow Wilson, the daughter of President Woodrow Wilson, on November 25, 1913. 

Several photos of Mr. Sayre were taken when the forthcoming nuptials were announced, and were circulated by the Bain News Agency:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4626423683/]

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4526080096/in/photostream/]

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4525450715/]

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4565504876/]
